settings.title: 24H Vol in MATIC
settings.value:
var vol = parseFloat(datasources["itbit-ticker-maticusd"]["volume24h"])

return (vol).toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')

settings.title: 24H Vol in USD
Mid Price
Spread
Slippages BUY at $10k
Slippages SELL at 10k
ORDERS COUNT
settings.value:
var bids = datasources["itbit-orderbook-maticusd"]["bids"]
var asks = datasources["itbit-orderbook-maticusd"]["asks"]
return "B: "+bids.length+", A:"+asks.length
